items.description: Development of custom solutions for various clients, including e-commerces, institutional websites and web systems. Specialization in Shopify and WordPress.
Technical leadership in large projects, custom theme and plugin development, API integration and performance optimization.
Development of scalable web applications, implementation of modern architectures and work in agile teams.
Career start with development of institutional websites, landing pages and small management systems.
